info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:55PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Eddy County through 745 PM MDT... At 655 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Malaga, or 18 miles southeast of Carlsbad, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carlsbad, Loving, Malaga, Otis and Cavern City Air Terminal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
